segments.text: May I be of any assistance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a look at the microwave ovens .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can have a broad choice here . Are you interested in a particular brand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . What are these toys over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ma'am , these are complimentary with each purchase . How about that one below the toys ? This is the best seller . They are of the latest model that can be found in town .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like its color . A bit too bright . Do you have a grey one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . What a great taste you have ! But we only have one left in stock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know a good product will always sell ! Would you mind waiting for a while , we'll get it right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here it is . It's very elegant , I think you will like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Its durability will be a big surprise to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 500 yuan . And if you buy it today , there will be a 15 % discount for you .
segments.speaker: S1
